welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Oestrich-Winkel! Get ready to experience the beauty of our picturesque town, known for its stunning vineyards and rich culture. Enjoy your stay and make sure to explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mainly Lufthansa and Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer and smaller terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mainly non-Star Alliance airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi for up to 4 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for VIP and executive flights at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
